meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inadvertent.
meanings.sent1: Her inadvertency in forgetting her keys led to her being locked out of the house.
meanings.sent2: His inadvertency in spilling the milk was forgiven by his mother.
meanings.sent3: The cat's inadvertency in knocking over the vase made for an unexpected mess.
meanings.sent4: The inadvertency of the student's mistake on the test surprised the teacher.
meanings.sent5: The inadvertency of the chef's error resulted in a burnt dish.
